list_definition.definition: (one of a number of) raised level banks of earth etc, like large steps, on the side of a hill etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Vines are grown on terraces on the hillside.

list_definition.definition: a row of houses connected to each other.
to make into a terrace or terraces

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The hillside has been terraced to make new vineyards.
